member.name: M:Gobln.Pager.IPagedList`1.GetNextPage
member.summary: Loads the next Page if possible and returns it.

member.name: M:Gobln.Pager.IPagedList`1.GetPreviousPage
member.summary: Loads the previous Page if possible and returns it.

member.name: M:Gobln.Pager.IPagedList`1.PeakNextPage
member.summary: Returns the next Page if possible without loading it (if the active page is the last Page, it will return the active Page).

member.name: M:Gobln.Pager.IPagedList`1.PeakPreviousPage
member.summary: Returns the previous Page if possible without loading it (if the active page is the first Page, it will return the active Page).

member.summary: Copies the elements of the PagedList to a new List.
member.returns: An List containing copies of the elements of the PagedList.

member.name: M:Gobln.Pager.IPagedList`1.ToArray
member.summary: Copies the elements of the PagedList to a new array.
member.returns: An array containing copies of the elements of the PagedList.

member.summary: Adds an object to the end of the Gobln.Pager.PagedList.
member.param: The object to be added to the end of the Gobln.Pager.PagedList. The value can be null for reference types.

member.name: M:Gobln.Pager.PagedList`1.Clear
member.summary: Removes all elements from the Gobln.Pager.PagedList.

member.name: M:Gobln.Pager.PagedList`1.Contains(`0)
member.summary: Determines whether an element is in the Gobln.Pager.PagedList.
member.param: The object to locate in the Gobln.Pager.PagedList. The value can be null for reference types.
member.returns: true if item is found in the Gobln.Pager.PagedList; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Gobln.Pager.PagedList`1.CopyTo(`0[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Copies the entire Gobln.Pager.PagedList to a compatible one-dimensional array, starting at the specified index of the target array.
member.param: The one-dimensional System.Array that is the destination of the elements copied from Gobln.Pager.PagedList. The System.Array must have zero-based indexing.
The zero-based index in array at which copying begins.
member.exception: The number of elements in the source Gobln.Pager.PagedList is greater than the available space from arrayIndex to the end of the destination array.

member.name: M:Gobln.Pager.PagedList`1.Remove(`0)
member.summary: Removes the first occurrence of a specific object from the Gobln.Pager.PagedList.
member.param: The object to remove from the Gobln.Pager.PagedList. The value can be null for reference types.
member.returns: true if item is successfully removed; otherwise, false. This method also returns false if item was not found in the Gobln.Pager.PagedList.

member.name: P:Gobln.Pager.PagedList`1.Count
member.summary: Gets the number of elements actually contained in the Gobln.Pager.PagedList.
member.returns: The number of elements actually contained in the Gobln.Pager.PagedList.

member.summary: Is the Gobln.Pager.PagedList readonly

member.name: M:Gobln.Pager.PagedList`1.IndexOf(`0)
member.summary: Searches for the specified object and returns the zero-based index of the first occurrence within the entire Gobln.Pager.PagedList.
member.param: The object to locate in the Gobln.Pager.PagedList. The value can be null for reference types.
member.returns: The zero-based index of the first occurrence of item within the entire Gobln.Pager.PagedList, if found; otherwise, â€“1.

member.name: M:Gobln.Pager.PagedList`1.Insert(System.Int32,`0)
member.summary: Inserts an element into the Gobln.Pager.PagedList at the specified index.
member.param: The zero-based index at which item should be inserted.
The object to insert. The value can be null for reference types.
member.exception: index is less than 0.-or-index is greater than Gobln.Pager.PagedList.Count.

member.name: M:Gobln.Pager.PagedList`1.RemoveAt(System.Int32)
member.summary: Removes the element at the specified index of the Gobln.Pager.PagedList.
member.param: The zero-based index of the element to remove.
member.exception: index is less than 0.-or-index is equal to or greater than Gobln.Pager.PagedList.Count.

member.name: P:Gobln.Pager.PagedList`1.Item(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets or sets the element at the specified index.
member.param: The zero-based index of the element to get or set.
member.returns: The element at the specified index.
member.exception: index is less than 0.-or-index is equal to or greater than Gobln.Pager.PagedList.Count.
